body.name: ASTOFLI Paper Towel Holder Under Cabinet No Drilling, Self Adhesive Paper Towel Holder Wall Mount for Kitchen,RV, Matte Black Paper Towel Holder 304 Stainless Steel, Under Cabinet Paper Towel Holder
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Friday, February 16 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Wednesday, February 14. Order within 21 hrs 47 mins
features: ☞【Applicable range】: Hanging Paper towel holder can be used to place towels,paper towel roll, plastic wrap, under cabinet paper towel holder and anything that can be hung. Also, this rv paper towel adhesive can be used in your RV wihout drilling.

☞【Multiple Installation Options】: Applicable for both adhesive and screws. Self adhesive paper towel holder design suits smooth surfaces as tiles, glass, wood, marble, metal. Install and fix with auxiliary stickers, press stick on paper towel holder for about 20 seconds then use it after 24 hours. On rough surfaces, paper towel holder wall mount can be installed with screws.

☞【Space Saving】: Self adhesive towel paper holder can attach horizontal or vertical,paper towel holder under cabinet mount can be used not only as paper towel holder but also as paper towel rack,tidy up your kitchen clutter or kitchen supplies,such as plastic wrap,aluminum foil,mugs,etc. Sturdy and secure it hangs,perfect solution to save your space!

☞【Paper Towel Rack Material】: Self adhesive no drilling paper towel holder made of standard SUS304 stainless steel,anti-scratch, waterproof, after various of tests, paper towel rack total bar length: 12.6 inches, distance from the wall: 3 inches, fits all different mega sizes of rolls. The max loading can reach 22lb.

☞【Excellent Shopping Experience】: Please feel free to contact us if you need any help from us or any inquiries about the under cabinet paper towel holder, we will give you a satisfactory solution within 24 hours.

How do you peel the adhesive strip off without damaging the wall? 1) Use a hot hair dryer to blow on the bond 2) Slowly and vigorously peel from the side where the hair dryer blows 3) A spare adhesive tape is included in the package. How do I know this paper towel holder fits my kitchen paper towel? Our paper towel holer fits almost every size of kitchen paper towel. Include the BIG ones. Are the adhesive strips sticky enough? We're now using 3M adhesive strips. It is very sticky and it can stick on the wall for over a year. Most unsticky situations are caused by low temperatures. if you buy this in winter, please heat the strips with hair dryer before you use them. Do I have to wait for 24 hours after I stick this on the wall? No need to wait that long if you only hang your paper towel on.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 17, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Comes with an adhesive to apply. It is very sturdy to put under cabinet. Looks good and frees up cabinet space.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Small kitchen success!
reviews.reviewText: Since figuring out that I can never move from my “starter home” I’ve been trying to make my space more efficient and getting things off the counter has been one of those things. The instructions were very easy and the included adhesive stuck very well and there was no need to drill! It holds an entire roll and looks great!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very strong, but needs to be screwed to underside of cabinet
reviews.reviewText: I tried using just the adhesive, but it fell off after a few hours. Once the screws were installed it was very stable and strong. Holder on end of roll is nice so it does not slide off. Plenty big for Costco sized rolls.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Pretty option for paper towel holders
reviews.reviewText: I love these, I marked it down in sturdiness but it's not bad; it will definitely hold up for many years, just a little less sturdy than I would have liked. But it works perfectly and was super easy to install. I love the look!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best paper towel holder out there.
reviews.reviewText: What can I say! It’s black, it’s simply designed, and it’s actually the size of a roll of paper towels. No bigger, no smaller. Really streamlines my kitchen and frees up counter space. The fact that it ships with 2x adhesive things that work super well annnndddd quality drywall anchors AANNDDDD black screws for solid panel mounting is just unreal. Thank you ASFLOWGUCI for your amazing product. Or whatever your name is. Amazon is weird. But this product is a total winner. You should totally buy 3.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Does the job!
reviews.reviewText: Item was exactly as represented and easy to install. Looks great and works better than my last stand-up holder.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewText: So simple to install, color exactly as pictured and sturdy. Exactly what we were looking for

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This is my second time buying this. I left our old one at our previous apartment because I didn't feel like getting it off. I like our countertops to be free of cutter and this just looks so slick and almost hides the paper towels.The only thing is that after about 2 years our older one started to unstick. I just put another adhesive sticker I had lying around and pressed it back on.
